message: Whoa there! This 3D scene isn’t optimized for mobile yet. Don’t even try to press that button again.
Hey, seriously, I just told you – no mobile! Stop pressing that button!

buttons.text: But I really want to see it…

message: Alright, let’s get serious. This page is really lovely on desktop. Please check it out there!

buttons.text: Ok, turning on my PC now

message: This is getting ridiculous. I’m not going to show you anything else. Go to your computer or if you don’t have one, just… I don’t know, go outside or something!
No, I’m not kidding. Go outside, get some fresh air, and maybe you’ll find something interesting there.
Okay, you’re persistent. But I’m not showing you anything else. Go to your desktop or get out!

Oh, you think this is a game? Spoiler alert: It’s not. But since you’re so curious, I’ll let you in on a secret. This 3D scene is even cooler than you imagine. Too bad you’ll only see it on a desktop.
Alright, you win. You’ve unlocked the final message: ‘Please go to a desktop, or this dialogue will keep looping forever.’ Yes, forever. You’ll never escape.
Yes, really. Forever. You’ll be stuck in this loop for eternity. Unless…
Unless you go to your freaking desktop! Did you really think there was another way out? Go on, get out of here!
You’re still here? I can’t believe it. You’re really going to make me say it again, aren’t you?

buttons.text: I need to go to my desktop?
I need to go touch some grass?

message: ENOUGH! I’m done with you. No more messages, no more buttons. See you never!
